subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: It was looking bad for Virender Sehwag when his batting partner Sachin Tendulkar was dismissed against Bangladesh, but he steadied himself to rack up a huge 175 runs to help India to cricket victory.
snippet: It was looking bad for Virender Sehwag when his batting partner Sachin Tendulkar was dismissed against Bangladesh, but he steadied himself to rack up a huge 175 runs to help India to cricket victory.
